mapper.select: SELECT ap.main_text AS title, ap.detail_text AS `desc`, ap.ad_path AS image, CONCAT('/lawyer/', l.no, '/homepage') AS link, l.no AS lawyerNo, l.name AS lawyerName, ap.tip_text AS badge FROM ad_purchase ap JOIN lawyer l ON ap.user_no = l.no WHERE ap.ad_type = 'MAIN' AND ap.ad_status = 1 AND ap.approval_status = 'APPROVED' AND NOW() BETWEEN ap.start_date AND ap.end_date ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 6
SELECT no, category_no AS categoryNo, title, content, incident_date AS incidentDate, created_at AS createdAt, updated_at AS updatedAt FROM board ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5

SELECT t.no, t.name, t.price, t.discount_rate AS discountRate, t.thumbnail_path AS thumbnailPath FROM template t WHERE t.user_no = 1 AND t.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY t.sales_count DESC, t.created_at DESC LIMIT 10
